description: This is a React component file for the 'How It Works' informational page of the RoadRescue QuickAssist platform. It includes multiple sub-components such as FlowStep and FaqItem, and defines the main exported component HowItWorksPage, which renders sections describing the process flow and FAQ for the service.

methods.name: FlowStep({ n, icon, title, subtitle, bullets })
methods.description: A React component representing a single step in the process flow, displaying an icon, title, subtitle, and bullet points.

methods.name: FaqItem({ q, a, open, onToggle, id })
methods.description: A React component representing a FAQ question and answer toggle item.
